name: The future.
description: The future cant be going as it is, deforestation, hunger, disease, war. It was always the way of the white man to "progress" with these problems, doesn't need to be like this, in 200 hundred years of industrial revolution we think it is gonna be like this forever, humans have 200.000 years approximately, to keep going to the future in a way we dont all die, we must open the curtains to our past.
